    Other Products

    • Board games
    • X-Wing 2.0
    • Arkham Horror LCG
    • Legend of the Five Rings
    • Novella

    We're a Canadian online store that specialises in the sales of Star Wars: Destiny singles as well as related products like mats, sleeves and dice binders. We now also carry Legend of the Five Rings, Arkham Horror LCG as well as a decent selection of board games.

    We offer free shipping to Canada on orders above 150$ (CAD) before sales taxes.  We can only ship Asmodee/FFG new products to Canadian adresses.. For other products, we offer free shipping to the US for orders above 200$ (CAD). This free shipping includes tracking. We're willing to ship internationally but you have to pay the actual shipping cost, no mater the size of your order.

    We try to offer the lowest price while also working very hard to keep as many cards in stock as possible.
